text: Thomas Lloyd (17 November 1903 – 20 January 1984) was an English professional footballer who played as a full-back for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1903 births Category:1984 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Wednesbury Category:English footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Walsall F.C. players Category:Willenhall F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Bradford (Park Avenue) A.F.C. players Category:Burton Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Tommy Lloyd (footballer)
